wiki.content: The The Wish you Were Here Songfacts says: Avril explained that this is a song that talks about, "Missing somebody for a day, for a week, for a month. Somebody you've had a falling out with, there's so many different circumstances in life that we all go through when we do truly miss somebody." User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The The Wish you Were Here Songfacts says: Avril explained that this is a song that talks about, "Missing somebody for a day, for a week, for a month. Somebody you've had a falling out with, there's so many different circumstances in life that we all go through when we do truly miss somebody."
